website_summaries.verdict: The perfect family-fun holiday wine glass markers. An activity that everyone at the dinner table can enjoy.
pros: Includes fun holiday-themed stencils to use on your wine glasses or kids' cups
There are a variety of colors to choose from, and all colors appear vibrant
Ink rarely smudges but easily comes clean with the included wipe
Ink also works effectively on plastic
cons: Stencils, while fun, are stiff and difficult to wrap around the glass

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept but they are not effective for its intended purpose. I bought this to write on cocktail glasses so that all the ladies in my dinner party could identify their drinks. And it absolutely did not work. The writing wiped right off onto their hands. Complete waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Mason jars!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to label my mason jars and other storage crockery and so far I love them! I love the different colors and the fact that they will stay smudge free during use and yet labels are easily washed when I'll need to change the contents of the jars. I am storing the markers upside down, as suggested, and I hope they last me a long time! I also tried using one to label a little leather credit card holder ... So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, multi-use for plastic bottles & wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Color selection is great, and the metallic hues really stand out on glass and plastic alike. I'm using these markers to mark the dates on breastmilk bottles and baby food containers, and they last well in the fridge and freezer on any glass or plastic. If left for a few days on plastic containers, I have to scrub a little to get the markings off, but glass is a breeze! I don't recommend these for containers that will have condensation..I've accidentally wiped the hot pink on my shirt too many times already. Haven't used the stencil yet, but for the price this is a fantastic set of wine glass markers!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Best party tool ever
customer_reviews.text: Best party tool ever! My guests love using this to customize their glasses, just make sure the glass is empty before you use.. doesn't work well if glass is wet or cold. Washes right off in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Just alright
customer_reviews.text: My set didn’t have a black color. The marker that was obviously supposed to be black (the outside plastic was black), actually drew a medium silver color. Disappointed that I didn’t get the black color. Other than that, the set was adequate. Some colors had more ink in them than others. The stencil didn’t work well—made messy drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Great colors! Dried quickly, didn't smear, and it came right off in the dishwasher without any pretreatment or effort! As a side note names on wine glasses can double as a "hello my name is" tag!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Le Blond

customer_reviews.title: Immediately useful and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my future mother-in-law. Within minutes of her family showing up for Christmas brunch, two people got into the confusing game of "my glass or yours?" These wine glass markers were immediately useful! Highly recommended as a cute gift or something to buy for yourself if you entertain!
customer_reviews.author: Jooolia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great for holiday or any party or gathering! Very easy to use, they hold very well while the party is going and wash away easily. Used them recently to label wine glasses and mason jars at a party and they were a hit, everyone wanted to design their own glass and had a lot of fun with it. Love them, might buy again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Gtz

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to leave messages
customer_reviews.text: I swear my family has ignored all instructions to keep the bathrooms clean. I thought this would be a fun way to leave notes for them to clean up after themselves and it actually worked. Now I use notes on the bathroom mirror more then I send text messages.
customer_reviews.author: Kireston Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for more than wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to support my journey in weight watchers. I'm writing the pounds I've lost on my full-length mirror along with a cumulative total for motivation. They write easily and look great. You need to get the tissue wet to wipe them off, but that's ok. I'm very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: Great in a party & for marking spice & storage jars
customer_reviews.text: Once people learn to use these it is so much easier to keep track of who's glass is who's. Cleanup was easy as the writing & drawings washed right off. I also use these to mark spice & other storage jars.
customer_reviews.author: L.R.W.

customer_reviews.title: work well, but 2 were dried out
customer_reviews.text: I use these to write on glass containers when I freeze leftovers. The ink comes off the glass well & is easy to read on the glass. The only reason I rated these 3 stars is that 2 of the markers were dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Shiclure

customer_reviews.title: Great hostess gift
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun holiday hostess gift...take the markers and have fun decorating your wine glasses!!! Personalization makes it so easy to keep track of your own. We made it game for the cutest!!! great idea...good customer service, quick delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to write on wine glasses and they came in handy for my mason jars as well. They work great and didn’t wash off until I wanted them to with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: David M Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Some where dried out
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the concept of these and I played with them a bit right away but some of the colors where already partially dried out. The ones that work are beautiful and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ownby

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The colors come right off! How can these work for painting glasses if it washes off with water and rubs off to the touch?
customer_reviews.author: Desirai Schild

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done. Make sure you let it dry before filling the glass with liquid. Condensation will wipe the writing off completely if its not dry yet.
customer_reviews.author: ALYSE RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Large Party!
customer_reviews.text: Marker stays put really well but still washes off easily. Also works great for plastic craft/bead organizers...you can write your item/color numbers on the individual compartments and erase and reuse for each project.
customer_reviews.author: Perk

customer_reviews.title: Washes off a little too easily
customer_reviews.text: These are a good idea and the kids like them. But they smudge off if you touch the part of the glass you wrote on. Not sure where to write so it will stay on. That being said, it washes off very easily
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Zipin

customer_reviews.title: A simple solution
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for helping party guests keep track of their glasses! Also good for marking coffee mugs at big family breakfasts.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One the colors didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like the colors. They were not as vibrant as I thought they were going to be. Also, the color golden was dry which was sad because I ordered mostly because of that color. Other than that it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria José

customer_reviews.title: Markers are great!! Purchased a second set to have around ...
customer_reviews.text: Markers are great!! Purchased a second set to have around the house! Names on glasses. Notes & reminders on refrigerator door. Loving & Encouraging messages on the bathroom mirror.... so many great ways to use them. They were shipping immediately, received on time and a nice massage of follow up! Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they write great, and come off easily when washed. My only desire is that the stencil be more flexible so it would fit around my wine glass better, but I was still able to use it fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I used them when bottling my Kombucha. Easy and clear writing on the bottles, and they are hearty enough not to smudge or rub right off, but comes off easily with soap and water when you want them off.
customer_reviews.author: Short4j

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing glass markers
customer_reviews.text: I was upset about this because it says "glass art" I thought it would be a "forever" kind of thing. Basically like a paint that was safe for glasses (wine glasses, cups etc) but no. It's for like decorating windows and being able to get wiped away, even after like 3 days of drying. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for writing on car Windows for graduations , wedding, birthdays, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for writing Congratulations on my van a Windows to celebrate my son's graduation. The writing stays in even after many rain days. Long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Milks

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: Gifted some and keep some. Tried to use. Let it sit for a minute and wiped off when I put my hand on the glass. Got my glass and hand messy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love these glass markers
customer_reviews.text: Love these glass markers. They make it easy to find your own glass with your name on it and the name washes off easily with soap and water. Will get these for gifts for my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Thousand Oaks customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try a new brand of wine markers, my favorite gift to give with a bottle. These are excellent, in a pretty box, and am happier to see they have more juice than other brands, which should keep them alive far longer. Shipped quickly and protected nicely in secure packaging. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SBL

customer_reviews.title: I gave these as a gift and were used right ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift and were used right away. They were used on wine glasses and seemed effective. They may smudge if used for drink glasses with ice. Haven't heard about that yet.
customer_reviews.author: PerpetualProjects

customer_reviews.title: Ink doesn’t stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Not such a good idea. The sweat from the glass makes the marker run. Will only work if written on a part of the glass that does not hold fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie VW

customer_reviews.title: Great for Personalizing party glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, but you will need to go over the lines a couple of times when using colors other than black to get them to show up well. Pens make me wish I was a better artist. Service was quick and the packaging minimal.

customer_reviews.text: Use these to mark my home canned jars. Works like a charm and comes right off in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.text: Markers are useless. They wipe off even after the set period. They wipe off with your finger days after writing on it. Total waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: They are much to thin in color looked like a stain glass marker set
customer_reviews.text: The set is just okay. They are much to thin in color looked like a stain glass marker set.

customer_reviews.text: I had a wine party and allowed everyone to draw on their glad as a game. Everyone loved it and it was a great way to make sure someone didn't pick up the wrong glass! Easy to wash off.

customer_reviews.title: it was a big hit and these markers were perfect. Easy to use and the color was great
customer_reviews.text: We used these markers this last weekend for my daughter's birthday party. She had a tea party and we had a table for the kids to decorate their own tea cup, it was a big hit and these markers were perfect. Easy to use and the color was great.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to use/clean off.

customer_reviews.text: And comes off easy so you have to write again multiple times

customer_reviews.title: Markers for Wine glasses, drinking glasses or mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Great choices of colors and easy to apply. There's no problem getting the marker off a glass or mug. My grandchildren love to decorate their glasses and/or mugs of hot chocolate.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sure did help for everyone .. no one picked up the wrong glass... only works on wine...

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The colors were not opaque enough at all. I tried decorating stemless wine glasses “confetti style” and my polka dots you could barely see. I am returning these. Waste of money in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Great Color Selection

product_meta.title: Glass Artist Wine Glass Markers - Pack of 8 with Drawing Stencil, Metallic Drink Markers, Wine Glass Charms, Erasable and Safe - Wine Accessories
feature_bullets: PERSONALIZE YOUR GLASS: Mixing up glasses at parties is really tricky for both the guests and the host. Save yourself the trouble with the wine glass markers, an easy solution that allows you to write directly on the glass the name of each guest, avoiding any mix-ups.

EXTRA FUN PAINT STENCIL - This wine glass marker set include a fun Paint Stencil, which will help you to paint on your glass instead of a wine glass charms and to decorate your mirror or windows at holiday season.

EASY TO USE: The wine pens can be used just like regular markers. You can simply write down the name of the person on the wine glass with one of the colorful markers and that’s it! After the party is over, you can wash the glasses with soap and warm water and the writing is gone.

PRACTICAL AND FUN: You can use the holiday drink markers for more than writing down the person’s name! Personalize each glass with an inspirational quote or funny message to surprise your guests with a memorable gesture.

BEAUTIFUL GIFT: The wine marker set comes in a unique gift box that your friends and family will love. Order this fun set of wine markers for stemless glasses for yourself or as a thoughtful housewarming gift for your loved ones.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars503 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
